Title: New display modes in Experiments
introduction:
We have added 3 display modes in Experiments. 

 Now, you can easily adjust the display height of each cell by switching between these modes.

New.description: Added graph for average prompt tokens.
Added P99 latency percentile to the latency graph.
Added reasoning effort option for o3-mini.

Improved.description: Added savable table view in Users.
Added savable table view in Threads.
You can now add custom model names to the Fallback list.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where Variable mode did not work in Logs.
Fixed a bug where prompt template display did not work.
Fixed a bug where variables could not be saved in Playground.
Fixed a bug where cost calculation showed NaN.
Fixed a bug where Gemini 2.5 Pro could not be called under Vertex AI.
